text: Sergio Di Giulio (April 4, 1945 – July 24, 2019) was an Italian actor and voice actor. ==Biography== Di Giulio studied at the Alessandro Fersen drama school. In 1968 he made his theater debut with L'estasi e il sangue, directed by Andrea Camilleri. Later, for three years, he attended the Stabile Theatre in Rome.È morto Sergio Di Giulio, doppiatore storico di Dan Aykroyd nella saga Ghostbusters Di Giulio was notable for dubbing the voices of Timmy's father in the animated show The Fairly Oddparents, Dan Aykroyd in Ghostbusters and Jim Belushi in Red Heat. He also served as an actor in the movie One Hamlet Less. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian male voice actors Category:Italian male television actors Category:Italian male film actors Category:Italian male stage actors Category:Voice directors Category:Male actors from Milan
title: Sergio Di Giulio
